subject: Records and Achievements
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: Marino Vanhoenacker won the Ironman Austria in Klagenfurt in a world-record time, beating the 14-year-old previous best mark by nearly four and a half minutes.
snippet: Marino Vanhoenacker won the Ironman Austria in Klagenfurt in a world-record time, beating the 14-year-old previous best mark by nearly four and a half minutes.
